ComicInfo.Summary:
Follow the Piper to Your Grave!: Vic and Mona travel into bayou country looking for a real haunted house.
The Cats Who Knew Too Much!: Butler Michael Renner kills his employer but soon finds out that her will stipulates he must take care of her cats or he will receive no money. Soon he begins to imagine that the cats are out to get him.
The Ferry Was Waiting!: Doctor Rawlings is transported on a night ferry whose captain died shortly ago. This way the deceased captain pays off a debt to the doctor.
The $30,000 Corpse: A criminal is released from prison but he gets an unexpected surprise when he goes to retrieve the stolen money he hid before he was caught.
Queen of the Snows!: Johnny Peril finds his friend Lee Allen, who just before he dies swears he has seen Subara the Ice Queen, who the natives believe lives on frozen Mt. Subara. Johnny returns to the mountain with two more friends, but only he encounters Subara. They refuse to believe he met the mythical woman until he produces her crown of roses.
Frightened to Death!: A man in a raft floating on the ocean finally finds land.
Till Death Do Us Unite: Truman Wilkes kills his wife but with no body he must wait seven years until she is ruled legally dead to inherit her money.
ComicInfo.Writer: George Kashdan,Jack Kirby,Murray Boltinoff,Robert Kanigher,Al Case,Robert Kanigher,Jack Kirby,Al Case,Murray Boltinoff,George Kashdan
